author: Ashtan Mistal
title: In-person lecture recording?
question: Hello! I was wondering- since we are going back to in-person classes, will lectures still be recorded?
instructor_answer:
We are working on the details and will announce a plan next week.
But please note that UBC's directions to us are to treat the rest of the term as face-to-face and on-campus. So we are making our plans with those directions in mind.
